tasks.title: Upgrade Firebase Storage for Document Management
tasks.description: Upgrade Firebase Storage to support secure file uploads, multiple file formats, and implement security rules for document management.
tasks.details: Configure Firebase Storage to accept PDF, JPG, PNG files. Set up security rules to restrict access. Implement document expiration tracking and prepare for OCR integration. Ensure encryption for sensitive documents.
tasks.testStrategy: Test file uploads, format support, security rule enforcement, and document expiration tracking. Verify encryption and access controls.

tasks.title: Implement Secure Document Upload and OCR Verification
tasks.description: Build secure file upload interface and integrate OCR for automated document verification.
tasks.details: Develop frontend upload component with validation for supported formats. Integrate OCR service for license/certificate verification. Store results in Firebase with audit logs. Implement document encryption.
tasks.testStrategy: Test upload flow, OCR accuracy, document encryption, and audit logging. Validate error handling for unsupported formats.

tasks.title: Develop Enhanced Scheduling System
tasks.description: Create a scheduling system with weekly availability, emergency toggle, timezone support, recurring patterns, and calendar integration.
tasks.details: Build UI for setting weekly availability, emergency toggle, and timezone selection. Support recurring patterns. Integrate Google Calendar/iCal. Store schedules in Firebase.
tasks.testStrategy: Test scheduling UI, timezone handling, recurring patterns, and calendar sync. Validate data persistence and error handling.

tasks.title: Enhance Service Details and Pricing
tasks.description: Add detailed service categorization, custom pricing tiers, equipment listing, custom service definitions, and map integration.
tasks.details: Extend form to include service categories, pricing tiers, equipment/tools, custom service fields. Integrate Google Maps API for service area mapping.
tasks.testStrategy: Test service form, pricing logic, equipment listing, map integration, and data validation.

tasks.title: Build Portfolio Management Features
tasks.description: Implement photo gallery, before/after images, project descriptions, video upload, and reference collection.
tasks.details: Develop portfolio upload interface for images/videos. Add before/after pairs, project description fields, and reference collection. Store in Firebase Storage.
tasks.testStrategy: Test image/video upload, project description, reference collection, and data integrity.

tasks.title: Integrate Stripe Connect for Payments
tasks.description: Integrate Stripe Connect for contractor payments, ACH, W-9 collection, bank account verification, and multiple payment methods.
tasks.details: Implement Stripe Connect integration. Add ACH, W-9 form collection, bank account verification, and support for multiple payment methods. Store payment info securely.
tasks.testStrategy: Test payment setup, ACH, W-9 collection, bank verification, and error handling. Validate security and data storage.

tasks.title: Optimize Mobile Onboarding Experience
tasks.description: Add camera integration, mobile UI improvements, SMS verification, offline support, and resume-later functionality.
tasks.details: Implement camera integration for document capture. Enhance mobile UI. Add SMS verification via gateway. Support offline form completion and resume-later.
tasks.testStrategy: Test camera integration, mobile UI, SMS verification, offline support, and resume-later flow.

tasks.title: Implement Accessibility and Auto-save Features
tasks.description: Add ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, screen reader support, high contrast mode, text size adjustment, auto-save, and progress indicators.
tasks.details: Implement ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, screen reader support, high contrast mode, text size adjustment. Add auto-save, progress indicators, and email link for resume.
tasks.testStrategy: Test accessibility features, auto-save, progress indicators, and resume functionality.

tasks.title: Enhance Form Validation and Help/Support
tasks.description: Add real-time validation, error messages, password strength, field hints, address autocomplete, help tooltips, popovers, example inputs, chat support, and FAQ.
tasks.details: Implement real-time validation, error messages, password strength, field hints, address autocomplete. Add help tooltips, popovers, example inputs, chat support, and FAQ section.
tasks.testStrategy: Test validation logic, help features, chat integration, and FAQ usability.

tasks.title: Implement Analytics and Security Features
tasks.description: Track form completion, drop-off points, field times, error frequencies, generate reports, add two-factor authentication, session management, and audit logging.
tasks.details: Integrate analytics to track form completion, drop-off, field times, errors, and generate reports. Add two-factor authentication, session management, and audit logging.
tasks.testStrategy: Test analytics collection, report generation, two-factor auth, session management, and audit logs.
